Header: “The Art of Racing in the Rain” scheduled to be released this month
Content: “The Art of Racing in the Rain” is an upcoming 2019 American comedy-drama film directed by Simon Curtis and written by Mark Bomback, based on the 2008 novel of the same name by author Garth Stein. The film stars Milo Ventimiglia, Amanda Seyfried and Kevin Costner as the voice of Enzo. Enzo, a dog owned by Denny and Eve Swift, reflects in this film about his relationship with his human family and being around in times of need. The film is scheduled to be released on 9th of this month by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures.
